text: I Am... Sasha Fierce is the third studio album by American singer Beyoncé. It was released on November 12, 2008 by Columbia Records. It featured a more of a pop and R&B; sound with heavy usage of dance music and ballads in its musical direction. == Background == Knowles worked on the album for almost one year. This is longer than she had spent on her previous solo albums and records with her old group Destiny's Child. She said that she has co-written and co- produced over 70 songs. In a statement released on Knowles official website, she wrote: > I am in a different place right now and I wanted people to see the many > sides of me. The music is upbeat for the dance, fun side and it is > reflective, passionate and serious for the personal side. I have taken risks > here. I am not afraid and my music will explain it all. There is no label or > tag on my sound. It's me and I am so excited to share it with the world on > November 18. == Track listing == ===Platinum edition=== In September 2009, an enhanced two-disc version of the album was released, its first disc featuring 16 tracks from the original version with four bonus audio tracks, and its second disc, the video collection from Above and Beyoncé, including seven music videos. ===The Bonus Tracks EP=== == Singles == # Cover Alternate cover 1\.
